devices.name: wan
devices.post_cmd_host: sudo ip link set netns $(docker inspect --format '{{.State.Pid}}' wan) dev enx00249b14dc6e
devices.post_cmd: ip link set enx00249b14dc6e name eth1
devices.cleanup_cmd: docker stop wan; docker rm wan

devices.name: lan
devices.post_cmd_host: sudo ip link set netns $(docker inspect --format '{{.State.Pid}}' lan) dev enx0050b61bfde4
devices.post_cmd: ip link set enx0050b61bfde4 name eth1
devices.cleanup_cmd: docker stop lan; docker rm lan

rpi3-1.notes: Rpi3 device with docker containers attached to WAN/LAN

qemux86-1.conn_cmd: sudo qemu-system-i386 -m 256 -nographic --enable-kvm -netdev tap,id=wan,ifname=bft-qemu-wan -device e1000,netdev=wan -netdev tap,id=lan,ifname=bft-qemu-lan -device e1000,netdev=lan

devices.name: wan
devices.post_cmd_host: sudo ip link set netns $(docker inspect --format '{{.State.Pid}}' wan) dev bft-qemu-wan
devices.post_cmd: ip link set bft-qemu-wan name eth1
devices.cleanup_cmd: docker stop wan; docker rm wan

devices.name: lan
devices.post_cmd_host: sudo ip link set netns $(docker inspect --format '{{.State.Pid}}' lan) dev bft-qemu-lan
devices.post_cmd: ip link set bft-qemu-lan name eth1
devices.cleanup_cmd: docker stop lan; docker rm lan
